gui.dragonminez.character_stats.title: Statistics
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.str.desc: Strength is the statistic that increases melee damage
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.skp.desc: Strike Power is the statistic that increases strike damage
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.res.desc: Resistance is the statistic that increases defense and stamina
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.vit.desc: Vitality is the statistic that increases maximum health
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.pwr.desc: Ki Power is the statistic that increases ki damage
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.ene.desc: Energy is the statistic that increases maximum ki
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.melee_da: Increasing Strength increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.strike_d: Increasing Strike Power increases this value by %s per point
Maximum stamina, used to perform melee and strike attacks
Increasing Resistance increases this value by %s per point
Increasing Resistance increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.health.t: Increasing Vitality increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.ki_damag: Increasing Ki Power increases this value by %s per point
gui.dragonminez.character_stats.max_ener: Increasing Energy increases this value by %s per point
race.dragonminez.human.desc: Humans are the most adaptable race. While they may not have the natural power of Saiyans or the regenerative abilities of Namekians, they possess incredible potential for growth and learning.
race.dragonminez.saiyan.desc: Saiyans are a warrior race with incredible combat abilities. They grow stronger after every battle and can transform into powerful Super Saiyan forms.
race.dragonminez.namekian.desc: Namekians are a peaceful race with incredible regenerative abilities and spiritual power. They excel at energy manipulation and support techniques.
race.dragonminez.frostdemon.desc: Frost Demons are a rare and powerful race. They possess natural transformations that suppress their overwhelming power, which they can release when needed.
race.dragonminez.bioandroid.desc: Bio Androids are artificial beings created from the cells of various powerful warriors. They can absorb energy and grow stronger through battle.
race.dragonminez.majin.desc: Majins are magical beings with incredible regenerative abilities and unique transformation potential. They possess both physical and magical capabilities.
command.dragonminez.stats.info.title: === Statistics for %s ===
command.dragonminez.stats.info.max_value: Max Health: %s | Max Energy: %s | Max Stamina: %s
command.dragonminez.bonus.add.all.succes: Added bonus '%s' (%s) to all stats for %s
command.dragonminez.bonus.clear.bonus.al: Removed bonus '%s' from all stats for %s
command.dragonminez.bonus.clear.all.succ: Cleared all bonuses from all stats for %s
command.dragonminez.bonus.invalid_stat: Invalid stat! Use: STR, SKP, RES, VIT, PWR, ENE, or ALL
command.dragonminez.locate.success: The nearest %s is at %s (%s blocks away)
command.dragonminez.locate.not_found: Could not find a location for %s nearby.
command.dragonminez.locate.wrong_dimensi: You cannot locate a structure from another dimension.
item.dragonminez.senzu_bean.cooldown: You must wait %s seconds before eating another Senzu Bean!
error.dmz.createcharacter: You must create a character first!
quest.dmz.party.invite.self: You cannot invite yourself to a party!
quest.dmz.party.invite.received: You have been invited to join %s's party
quest.dmz.party.invite.accept.hover: Click to accept the party invitation
quest.dmz.party.invite.reject.hover: Click to reject the party invitation
quest.dmz.party.invite.none: You have no pending party invitations
quest.dmz.party.leave.solo: You are not in a party with other players
dmz.quest.saiyan1.name: The Master's Island
dmz.quest.saiyan1.desc: Master Roshi has been training warriors for generations. Find his house on a small island to begin your journey.
dmz.quest.saiyan2.name: The Saiyan Threat
dmz.quest.saiyan2.desc: A powerful Saiyan warrior named Raditz has arrived on Earth. Travel to the plains and defeat him before he causes more destruction.
dmz.quest.saiyan3.name: The Saibamen Attack
dmz.quest.saiyan3.desc: More Saiyans have arrived! Head to the mountains and defeat the 6 Saibamen they've planted before they wreak havoc.
gui.dragonminez.quests.title: Quests
gui.dragonminez.config.title: Configuration
skill.dragonminez.fly.desc: Allows you to fly through the air. Consumes stamina while active.
skill.dragonminez.kaioken.desc: A powerful technique that multiplies your stats temporarily. Can be stacked with transformations.
skill.dragonminez.zenkai.desc: When near death, you receive a temporary power boost.
skill.dragonminez.meditation.desc: Increases your energy regeneration rate both passive and active.
skill.dragonminez.superform.desc: Access to powerful transformations unique to your race.
skill.dragonminez.godform.desc: Access to divine transformations with godly ki.
skill.dragonminez.legendaryforms.desc: Access to rare and legendary transformations.
